main.name: Adela Sebestova
main.description: I'm currently on track to become a product manager, transitioning from project management position at a startup. I have gained exposure into product management.
main.bio: I've completed a full stack web development bootcamp, using Angular and React frameworks. Recently, I've dived into React Native application development.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: Brighton University, UK & EM Normandie Business School, France

education.degree: BC Studies of European Economy, Administration and Culture

education.description: Angular and React frameworks, Express, NodeJS, mongoDB

work.title: Project Manager
work.description: Driving development and delivery of mobility and payment applications. Spearheading localization efforts and optimizing the translation process via TMS tool, including communication triage with translation agencies, clients and developers. Completed translations of our applications into 5 foreign languages and counting. Successfully launched multiple projects from the initial proposal to product launch. Owning the collection and prioritization of requirements from clients and translating them in cooperation with developers and product managers into state-of-the-art solutions. Managing integrations with a large number of third-party vendors and partners, good knowledge of APIs. In direct contact with clients and internal stakeholders, including reporting and escalating to the executive management team. Improved internal processes by created an internal tracking mechanism of feature/product releases to clients across the company, which includes standardized feature documentation shared among PMO. Created an internal tracking system for change orders shared across all departments.

work.title: Project Manager
work.description: Managed audit lifecycle process and owned relationship with compliance operations team in Asia, including internal software update and implementation communication. Improved process flow and contributed to smooth running of multiple ticket queues as part of change management efforts. Created reports and recommended action items to internal stakeholders to help improve internal processes and expedite issue resolution times.

work.title: Project Manager
work.description: Improved customer service by creating personalized registration and submission websites. Trained and managed an international team and on-site staff at 3 conference of 1,500 attendees. Contributed to internal software & process optimization.

work.title: Project Manager
work.description: In charge of project planning from initial proposal to its execution and evaluation.

work.title: Assistant Account Manager
work.description: Assisted with coordination of delegate groups attending medical conventions in the US.

projects.title: Let it go app
